tool_description: Provides real-time market data feeds including quotes, trades, and market status information from multiple venues for trading decisions.

symbols.description: List of symbols to subscribe for market data

venues.description: List of venues to receive market data from

data_types.description: Types of market data: quotes, trades, depth, statistics

error_messages: Symbol not available: One or more symbols are not available on specified venues.
Venue connection failed: Cannot establish market data connection to one or more venues.
Invalid data type: Data type must be one of [quotes, trades, depth, statistics].
Update frequency too high: Minimum update frequency is 100 milliseconds.
Subscription limit exceeded: Too many symbol-venue combinations requested.
usage: Provide arrays of symbols and venues for market data subscription. Optionally specify data types and update frequency for customized feeds.

subscription_status.description: Market data subscription status: active, partial, or failed

active_feeds.description: List of active market data feeds in format 'venue:symbol:data_type'

market_status.description: Market status for each venue in format 'venue:status'
